Test Name: Coccidioides Antibody Reflex (Complement Fixation and Immunodiffusion), Serum
Purpose: To detect and quantify Coccidioides antibodies in serum using complement fixation and immunodiffusion, ensuring accurate and reliable results.
Equipment: Complement Fixation assay kit, Immunodiffusion kit, microtiter plates, pipettes and pipette tips, incubator, centrifuge, refrigerator, freezer, vortex mixer
